articles.title: Mandeep Singh starts to hit the straps again after difficult phase
articles.description: He had missed most of Punjab's matches in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy because of dengue, which was followed by a poor Vijay Hazare Trophy after which he tested positive for Covid-19 .
articles.content: Mandeep Singh began this Ranji Trophy season with 84 against Himachal Pradesh. But by his own admission, he was not happy with how he fared in the middle. Something was not right yet he could not put… [+5048 chars]

articles.description: Tamil Nadu batsman with three consecutive centuries says stint with India Test opener Mayank Agarwal's long-time coach RX Murali helped add new dimensions to his game
